snippet.title: King's Bounty: Ultimate Edition
snippet.description:
King's Bounty: Ultimate Edition is the complete collection of all King's Bounty games released so far. This includes Legend, Armored Princess, Crossworlds, Warriors of the North (plus Ice and Fire DLC), Dark Side. All games are available in multiple languages and with all updates.

The game can be purchased on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/sub/84127/
